events.title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
Canada mass shooting suspect had police visits over mental health struggles
Australia politics live: Angus Taylor becomes new Liberal leader as Sussan Ley deposed after nine months; Jane Hume wins deputy role
